base.$description: Base fill for interactive components (buttons, chips).

selected.$description: Selected / toggled fill for interactive components.

active.$description: Pressed / active fill for interactive components.

selected.$description: Usage: Used for selected filter chips/pills to provide soft visual emphasis without adding heavy contrast. Helps distinguish selected states from default or hovered ones. Applies To: Filter components, tag selectors, segmented controls, multi-select toggles.

cursor.$description: Usage: Used for selected filter chips/pills to provide soft visual emphasis without adding heavy contrast. Helps distinguish selected states from default or hovered ones. Applies To: Filter components, tag selectors, segmented controls, multi-select toggles.

page.$description: Page canvas – body background behind all other surfaces.

section.$description: Alternating band used to visually separate long page sections.

card.$description: Default surface for cards, modals, sheets and tooltips.

list.$description: Default surface for cards, modals, sheets and tooltips.

dimmer.$description: Translucent scrim that dims content behind dialogs & drawers.

none.$description: No corner rounding. Used for flat elements like toggles, table cells, and dividers.

sm.$description: Smallest usable radius for pills, badges, or compact UI controls

full.$description: Fully rounded corners for circular avatars, buttons, or pill-shaped elements.

0-5.$description: Fractional steps use an underscore: x_5 means ½ step (e.g., 1_5 = 12 px)

1-5.$description: Fractional steps use an underscore: x_5 means ½ step (e.g., 1_5 = 12 px)

stack.$description: Vertical spacing between stacked components like cards, rows, or fields

grid.$description: Horizontal spacing between grid columns or flex containers

inner.$description: Internal padding inside cards, inputs, or modal content areas

primary.$description: Primary body copy on light surfaces.

secondary.$description: Secondary copy – captions, meta, helper text.

accent.$description: Primary body copy on light surfaces.

inverse.$description: Inverse copy on dark or brand-colored surfaces.

placeholder.$description: Inverse copy on dark or brand-colored surfaces.

disabled.$description: Inverse copy on dark or brand-colored surfaces.

default.$description: Hair-line dividers inside cards & lists; grid lines; table cell rules.

standard.$description: Standard component outlines—cards, input fields, dropdowns.

emphasis.$description: High-contrast borders—section separators, accordion rails, dark-theme outlines.

success.$description: Use for confirmation or success states. Applies to success messages, banners, icons, borders, and badge fills.

bg.$description: 20 % tint of brand green – subtle success background.

base.$description: Use for confirmation or success states. Applies to success messages, banners, icons, borders, and badge fills.

error.$description: Use for destructive or error states. Applies to form validation messages, error banners, icons, borders, and alert fills.

ada.$description: Use for destructive or error states. Applies to form validation messages, error banners, icons, borders, and alert fills.

bg.$description: Use for destructive or error states. Applies to form validation messages, error banners, icons, borders, and alert fills.

base.$description: Use for destructive or error states. Applies to form validation messages, error banners, icons, borders, and alert fills.
Base fill for interactive components (buttons, chips).

selected.$description: Selected / toggled fill for interactive components.

active.$description: Pressed / active fill for interactive components.

thumb.$description: Default surface for cards, modals, sheets and tooltips.

track.$description: Default surface for cards, modals, sheets and tooltips.

green accent strip.$description: Gradient - Texas Health Green -> Lime Green

blue accent strip.$description: Gradient - Texas Health Blue -> Soft Blue

blue green arch.$description: Arch gradient - starting from logo blue, bright blue, teal, lime green, to logo green

green blue arch.$description: Arch gradient - starting from logo green, lime green, teal, bright blue, to logo blue

primary blue arch.$description: Gradient - starting from teal to logo blue

lg.$description: Primary page headline used across content and article pages. Set in Nunito Sans Light, 53px, with 120% line height and 0% letter spacing. Designed for top-level titles, and maximum visual impact. Ideal for hero sections or main headings.
